law.catch_line: Sales Of Alcoholic Beverages By On Premise Licensees On Sundays And Certain Legal Holidays; Sales Between 10:00 A.M. And 12:00 Noon
law.text: The local licensing authority of any city or town which accepts this section may authorize licensees under section twelve to sell alcoholic beverages between the hours of 10:00 a.m. and 12:00 noon on Sundays, the last Monday in May and on Christmas day or on the day following when said day occurs on Sunday.
